name: Tryp Cordoba

reviews.text: 3 star hotel of the group Sol-Melia.
reviews.title: Clean and well located. No charm.

reviews.text: -Location. The hotel is close to the train station, commercial area, and historical centre, and yet easy to get to if you are by car (private parking is not free but it is possible to find a place on the street)
reviews.title: Okay

reviews.text: -Recently renewed and very clean rooms with all facilities.
reviews.title: Great Value
Tryp Los Gallos Hotel
reviews.text: -Price, if you get a good internet offer.

description: The Tryp Gallos hotel is located in the heart of the city of Cordoba, just 10 minutes from the Mosque, Jewish quarters, Alcazar of Christian Kings, Synagoge, Arab quarters and the Calahorra Tower. 5 minutes from the AVE train station and main shopping areas.
